channel.title: When and what was your best day ever?
channel.description: My best day ever was may 27, 2010 the day i left middle school :)

item.title: When and what was your best day ever?
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

The first day I came.

Read full topic
item.source: When and what was your best day ever?

item.title: When and what was your best day ever?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Yesterday actually. I went to Chicago, and although I’ve been there plenty of times before, this time it was much more genuine. I went with my two best friends while we discussed our future, philosophical matters, and how small we actually are to this world. I never truly realized that at the age of 18 you can go anywhere and live your life any which way you want. It’s just a matter of how you get there.

Read full topic
item.source: When and what was your best day ever?

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:
